statements.query: MATCH (:AWSAccount{id: $AWS_ID})-[:RESOURCE]->(:ECRRepository)-[:REPO_IMAGE]->(:ECRRepositoryImage)-[:IMAGE]->(n:ECRImage) WHERE n.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH n LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DETACH DELETE (n)
MATCH (:AWSAccount{id: $AWS_ID})-[:RESOURCE]->(:ECRRepository)-[:REPO_IMAGE]->(:ECRRepositoryImage)-[r:IMAGE]->(:ECRImage) WHERE r.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH r LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DELETE (r)
MATCH (:AWSAccount{id: $AWS_ID})-[:RESOURCE]->(:ECRRepository)-[:REPO_IMAGE]->(n:ECRRepositoryImage) WHERE n.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH n LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DETACH DELETE (n)
MATCH (:AWSAccount{id: $AWS_ID})-[:RESOURCE]->(:ECRRepository)-[r:REPO_IMAGE]->(:ECRRepositoryImage) WHERE r.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH r LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DELETE (r)
MATCH (:AWSAccount{id: $AWS_ID})-[:RESOURCE]->(n:ECRRepository) WHERE n.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH n LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DETACH DELETE (n)
